price: Hakika Sisi tuliwapelekea ukelele mmoja tu, wakawa kama mabuwa ya kujengea uwa.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَكَانُواْ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلۡمُحۡتَظِرِ
footnotes: Sisi tuliwapatiliza kwa ukelele mmoja tu, wakawa kama miti mikavu anayo ikusanya yeyote atakaye kujengea boma la uwa wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā arsalnā ʿalayhim ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fakānū kahashīmi al-muḥ'taẓiri
